Mercvry, or, The secret and svvift messenger shewing, how a man may with privacy and speed communicate his thoughts to a friend at any distance. Wilkins, John, 1614-1672. Kinnaston, Francis, Sir, 1587-1642.
[14], 180 p.
Printed by I. Norton, for Iohn Maynard and Timothy Wilkins ..., London : 1641.
Commendatory poems by Sir Francis Kynaston and others. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
